text:
[x] Other restraining orders:
The Restrained Person may not text, email, or telephone the Protected Person EXCEPT as specifically permitted, below:
The Restrained Person may communicate with the Protected Person via Our Family Wizard solely to co-parent the parties’ children and/or to discuss
the management of shared assets.
The Restrained Person may also communicate with the Protected Person via email in communications with third parties to facilitate business
concerning their minor children and/or managing the parties’ shared assets.
The Restrained Person may forward emails from third parties to the Protected Person as “FYI.”  and allow for 1-1 updates and inline responses to
provide context or advance a private 1-1 discussion on the matter. Example: school admission
The Restrained Person may use phone calls via the OFW platform for short-notice, urgent communications, such as notifying for late handoffs or

metadata.section: Do you want to send the note to Annalisa for the RO updates noted below? I think she may bristle if it comes from Lisa tbh.
